def main():
    T = int(input())
    while T > 0:
        diff()
        T -= 1

def diff():
    (N, S) = map(int, input().split())
    t1 = min(N, S)
    t2 = S - t1
    max_diff = t1 - t2
    print(max_diff)
main()
